name: No More Golden Days
summary:
It is 87 BC, right after Sulla's first March on Rome, A patrician woman from the ancient Cornelii family is facing a tough decision: Sacrifice herself to preserve household against her husband's political enemies, or sacrifice her household to preserve the name of her family. 

What would you choose?​
info:
• 中文名: 辉煌不再
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 游戏引擎: Ren'Py
